title: URF RANKED?
body:
How about we have URF ranked?

Please say what you think! :){{champion:82}}

replies.body: URF isn't even close to balanced enough for a ranked mode.
well if u got bans and stuff it's fine :) (if it was normal urf)
When Riot disables champs for URF because they are way too broken for it, that should tell you the mode is meant for fun, not competition and ranking.
They could work on it tho.
They could also dedicate resources to better projects. Let fun modes stay fun modes and don't try to muck around with balancing an already challenging mess around additional ranked modes.
No
Why not?
I could care less about the idea
